Create an eco-friendly toothbrush made from sustainable and recyclable materials.
Develop a toothbrush that doubles as a pressure sensor to alert the user when they are applying too much pressure on their gums.
Create a toothbrush holder with compartments to store multiple toothbrushes horizontally to maintain cleanliness.
Develop a toothbrush with built-in Bluetooth connectivity for users to track their brushing habits and receive personalized reminders to brush for the recommended amount of time.
Create a toothbrush that comes with interchangeable head attachments for different teeth surfaces (e.g. gum care, whitening, sensitivity).
